text: Wonderful cafe serving Thai and local fare. Came for dinner with family, we absolutely loved the Guniess Beef Stew, Hokkien Mee and Basil Chicken. Highly recommended for a good meal if you are in the area.

Got a garlic pork with rice and though the pork was fragrant and not too dry, it was a little oily which seeps down the rice. One more thing was that the garlic was burnt which I didn‚Äôt enjoy.

I think other dishes from this store should be better based on the reviews, and it gets crowded during lunch time, so be there early or prepare to wait.

Oh local coffee isn‚Äôt that bad here too.
Change upon this hidden gem while on the hunt for food... Surprisingly good Thai food at affordable neighborhood price... Definitely will be back

It's great the iced choclate was quite great it was mot too thick or thin. The presentationwss also very exquisite üëè loved it. The service was really good the waiters were very polite as and my drink was served very fast js like lightning mcqueen. Great place for a quick gathering with friends and loved ones.

Nice cafe with Thai food.
Had the Tom Yum Fried Rice n I loved it. Beware there's a spicy kick!
The prawn cakes were also nice n good for sharing. Atmosphere is nice, we managed to get a seat inside and was crowded on Sun for lunch.
